title: Best of the Program | 2/7/22
description:
Glenn and Stu start the show with the latest Joe Rogan controversy, as the Left continues to vilify those who go against the narrative. Glenn goes on a rant about the Chinese Olympics and NBC. Glenn discusses Ray Dalio's opinion that America is headed toward a civil war.
